title: Who Is To Blame?
description:
Michael Wilbon and Frank Isola discuss how much Tom Brady is to blame for last night’s loss to the Ravens, how important Game 1 of the World Series is to the Astros and if the Nets will be able to put it all together this season. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: How important Game 1 is to the Astros and is Tom Brady to blame?
